headline: Neutrogena-Maker Kenvue Beats Profit Forecast, Ups Sales Outlook (UPDATED)
summary: Editor’s Note: Self care segment revenue growth updated Consumer health company Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE) on Thursday reported first-quarter 2025 sales of $3.74 billion, beating the consensus of $3.68 billion. Sales decreased 3.9% year over year, reflecting a 1.2% organic sales decline and a 2.7% foreign currency headwind. The organic sales decline was driven by 0.3% unfavorable value realization, reflecting planned strategic price investments, and a 0.9% volume decline. Some of Kenvue's most icon

headline: Barbie maker Mattel taps Kenvue's Paul Ruh as CFO
summary: Mattel on Thursday named consumer health giant Kenvue's Paul Ruh as CFO, replacing Anthony DiSilvestro. Ruh was the finance chief of the Tylenol maker following its spinoff from drug and medical device maker Johnson & Johnson in 2023. He was replaced by Kellanova's Amit Banati as CFO earlier on Thursday.

headline: Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE) Appoints New CFO as 2025 Sales Increase 1%-3%
summary: Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE) recently appointed Amit Banati as its new CFO, an executive change aligning with its strategy to augment shareholder value. Concurrently, the company raised its net sales guidance for 2025, expecting an increase of up to 3%, and reported first-quarter earnings with net income of $296 million. During the last quarter, Kenvue's share price moved up by 17%, a shift resonating with broader positive market trends, including a 7.7% market climb over the past year. These events,...

headline: Kenvue Announces Chief Financial Officer Transition
summary: SUMMIT, N.J., May 08, 2025--Kenvue Inc. (NYSE: KVUE), today announced the appointment of Amit Banati as the Company’s Chief Financial Officer, effective May 12, 2025. He will be responsible for overseeing the Finance and Strategy functions, supporting initiatives aimed at accelerating profitable growth and delivering value to shareholders.
